description: Simple, quick and lightly spiced halloumi skewers.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Egg free,Sesame free
name: Tandoori Halloumi Skewers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium red onion, peeled and cut into chunks
1 medium red capsicum, de-seeded and cut into chunks
1 medium green capsicum, de-seeeded and cut into chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare your marinade by frying all your marinate spices on a non-stick pan on medium heat for 30 seconds and remove from the heat.
Combine the heated spices with the yoghurt and lime juice.
Prepare your peppers, onion and halloumi into cubed and skewer them.
Allow your skewers to marinate in the tandoori sauce overnight in the fridge.
Next day, take the skewers from the marinate and chargrill for 3 minutes with the canola oil while turning constantly.
Remove from the heat when they start to brown and serve with the leftover marinade to dip.
